item.title: About
item.description:
About Me

Hi, I’m Rahul Saravanan, a 4th-year student at PES University.

This blog is my space â€” a journal of my journey, experiences, and reflections. It’s a place where I document the things I’m learning, building, and going through in life.

Whether you’re here by chance or looking to collaborate, I hope something here resonates with you or helps in some way.

If you’re interested in working together or just want to connect, please feel free to reach out.
